txt.en: 'Is there a queue for the forge or something?'
The leader of the Weaponsmith's Guild has asked you to forge a blade to fill an order from the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nForge a guild-pattern blade.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern blade

'The Guild Leader of the Metalsmith's Guild placed an order for a special sword. As one of our finest, I think your work would represent us well to our cousin guild. We will construct this weapon together. Start with the blade. We'll go from there.'
'Is there a queue for the forge or something?'
Executed the recipe for a guild-pattern blade

'The Guild Leader of the Metalsmith's Guild placed an order for a special sword. As one of our finest, I think your work would represent us well to our cousin guild. We will construct this weapon together. Start with the blade. We'll go from there.'
Turn in a guild-pattern blade ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Cottar Tunnelly
Talk to the Weaponsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern blade ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Weaponsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
